title: Visual Expertise Development Training for Medical Imaging Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners strengthen pattern recognition skills in medical imaging data based on mathematical analysis. A blended class combining asynchronous assignments and real-time feedback, personalized to individual progress in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify abnormal patterns in EKG and CXR images with 80% accuracy within 3 seconds
Learners can reduce visual attention span during image interpretation by 40% through two weeks of visual processing task training
Learners can improve their N170 ERP-like metrics (visual processing efficiency) by 15% through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
